actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

references.type: text of measure as introduced in Senate

actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for the enhancement of study, research, and other activities in the United States relating to information technology and information protection technology.

summary.text: Amends the Barry Goldwater Scholarship and Excellence in Education Act to include study relating to information technology and information protection technology under its scholarship and fellowship program.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the enhancement of study, research, and other activities in the United States relating to information technology and information protection technology.
